items.label: MDSD, MDD, ou MDA : quel outil choisir ?
items.description: Co-wrote with Arnaud Buisine the article 'MDSD, MDD, ou MDA : quel outil choisir ?' (MDSD, MDD or MDA : what tool should you choose ?) published in french Programmez ! magazine issue 115 in January 2009

items.label: Créez votre propre langage et son éditeur Eclipse avec Xtext
items.description: Wrote the article 'Créez votre propre langage et son éditeur Eclipse avec Xtext' (Create your own language and his Eclipse based editor using Xtext) published in french Programmez ! magazine issue 129 in April 2010

items.label: Multimodal deep networks for text and image-based document classification
